topic.title: Create an Object for Data Reception

dd.p: This section describes how to create an object for the reception of data from the host.
The object you create stores a list of documents. Each entry in this list is an instance of the PrinterDocumentListRecordclass.
The class required to create an object for data reception is:
To create an object for data reception:
You can extend this class to vary the criteria used to check contents, and therefore interrupt the interaction.
